Reviews.Title: defective out of the box
Reviews.Author: tg
Reviews.Content: well everything sounded great when i bought this and read everyones reviews but i guess unfortunately for me i got the one defective tablet out of the bunch. i boot it up and the touch screen doesnt work at all. i contacted the seller and ill see what theyll do for me. pretty mad because i really wanted it for school but by the time i recieve another one the semester will be over. ill update this review when they email me back.UPDATE:Value Max emailed me and were very considerate and payed for shipping it back to them and I should be receiving a refund soon. They first said that tech support would contact me to resolve the issue but they must have realized that obviously there was nothing they could do with a non responsive touch screen. Id rather try out the ainol novo flame english edition and hope for the best with that tablet.

Reviews.Title: Tursion 10 in
Reviews.Author: Ron Urbanski
Reviews.Content: nothing more then a paper weight, t's a piece of crap, don't waste your money. worst thing I ever bought, and no support.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Merilyn Perez
Reviews.Content: This product the best. and the company always ontime..thanks for be honest. I really appreciate that and next time I going to purchase more item.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: joel
Reviews.Content: good tablet working fine i hope it last long keep up the good work only thing is more items were need like otG cable and head phone
